name: Adustrio and Lunam
description:
Adustrio and Lunam is my first game I made on twine while I was at my game design class in 2015. It's cute little game where Lunam, the moon, and Adustrio,the sun, like each other, but they don't know how to tell each other their true feelings.

(2017 Update lol): It's going to be a webcomic soon which is crazy since it's been two dang years since I made this omg
